The atmosphere is authentic and quaint with an outdoor patio in a small square to add extra ambiance.  The food was amazing.  My wife and I shared a few dishes and we're both surprised that even things a little out of our comfort zone, were fantastic.  The swarm of waiters were attentive and I was amazed that they all knew our order in such a busy place.  Try the eggplant, calamari and salmon tartar!  We enjoyed the wine and coffee at a reasonable price.  Definitely worth wandering the Born to stumble upon this gem!
